name: Sensa Hotel

reviews.text: Situated right at chiwalk mall - this is a convenient place to stay. There is a nearby mid range supermarket in the mall which can supply your daily needs. For eatery you can find a range of them from Pizza Hut, Starbucks, j co to our favorite Warung Talaga. The street outside this hotel is fame for jeans - for those who live them.
reviews.title: Value offer for a stylish hotel

reviews.text: Facilities in the hotel are good however the room wifi is a little cranky. There are times when the connection is very weak & unstable and you just can't log on. This can be extremely frustrating.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Rooms are very well lighted and bathroom showers are good. We stayed at room 1202 and the room view is gorgeous.
reviews.title: One night at Junior Suite

reviews.text: The other thing worth mentioning about sensa is their good breakfast spread. They serve international & local breakfast spread. There is a coffee bar as well where you can order your lattes & cappuccinos.
reviews.title: A very good location hotel in a happening surroundings...

reviews.text: Other than the unstable wifi - I am pleased with what the hotel is offering
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location

reviews.text: I stayed at Sensa Hotel to celebrate my wedding anniversary with my wife...
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with great staffs!!! (15/11-17/11/2012)

reviews.text: Room - Clean with excellent view of Bandung City... Zen design
reviews.title: One of the most convenient hotels in Bandung

reviews.text: Facilities - Gd & clean facilities... They have a small pool for you... On 3rd level of the 12 floor hotel. They have Spa,restaurant & gym.
reviews.title: Cold, boring decoration, unwelcoming room.

reviews.text: Staff - The most friendly staffs we ever encounter in Indonesia... Ever ready to serve you during your stay in Bandung... A special thanks to Ms Nathania (From Marketing Department) who was excellent in her work & service rendered to us... From reservation till we check out... Got a special gift from Sensa Hotel for my wife... A nice bag... My wife loves it.... Thank you Nathania & all Sensa Hotel staffs for the great stay... Hope your management appreciate & recognise your professionalism & effeciency... You did Sensa Hotel proud!!!
reviews.title: Beautiful ,clean and nice hotel ... at Cihampeles

reviews.text: Location - Hotel beside Ciwalk & some factory outlets (1 min walk).. Near to most shopping location like Rumah Mode & Paris Van Java ( 20-30mins by vehicle when traffic is bad).. Do get a chartered vehicle (From hotel reception) when you move around... For 12hrs, you pay 500k Rupiah... You can visit Tangkuban Perahu (Volcano), Naturel (Strawberry Park) & other places of interest.
reviews.title: Good Hotel worth staying

reviews.text: Bandung has some great golf courses. And Sensa is a great hotel to form that part of the itinerary, not only for accomodations, but also for the transport that they helped arranged.
reviews.title: Great complement to a golf vacation

reviews.text: The arranged bus was punctual and rsponsive, making the logistics of loading, unloading the olf bags, arriving to the courses in time and being picked up after the game, totally hassle free.
reviews.title: our first choice...

reviews.text: The hotel rooms were clean, the staff very courteous and responsive to every need and changes needed for a great golf trip.
reviews.title: The Bandung Star

reviews.text: Much has been written by other conributors on the good buffet breakfast, the excellent location and the convenience of being just next to a shopping mall. All these were good and Sensa will be the hotel our golf buddies will return to the next time we want to play in bandung again.
reviews.title: Sensa hotel is my no. 1 choice if hotel in Bandung!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are only two downsides. The wifi while free is slow. The other is the morning call to prayer by the nearby mosques which is very loud and will wake you up in the early hours if you are light sleeper. Maybe thicker curtains may help screen the sound better.
reviews.title: Convenient location, great room,great service, great view... but wifi sucks

reviews.text: A nice and new hotel in the heart of Bandung. Strategically placed and modernly designed. Close to restaurants so you just walk from hotel to one of Bandung's hang out place. Plenty of parking space in the basement. We with teenage kids enjoyed our stay, the room is quite roomy and we liked the view of Bandung from the swimming pool. Free internet in the room. Will again stay in this hotel if the rate is good.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, strategic location

reviews.text: Sensa hotel is a great place to stay in Bandung. The key word for the rooms in this hotel is space. The bedrooms are spacious for two adults or a family of four and come with a balcony that provide a view of the city. The beds are clean and comfy, The bathrooms are brightly litted and there is ample space for his and her toiletries. If you don't feel like shopping, chill in the room with 59 channels to accompany you. The breakfast spread is deliciously prepared with a range of western and Indonesion dishes to choose from. And when the restaurant is not busy, the barrista will send the cappucino to your table. Another secret we discovered is taking pictures by the pool- at night. When the restaurant is empty, choose any one of the humongous cabanas or cute sofas and take a photo with the city skyline as your backdrop, Breathtaking.Not only is it a beautiful hotel, it is also strategically located. For the price, the mod outlook and the location, I'd say that the hotel is a good bargain.
reviews.title: Close to a sensa-tional stay

reviews.text: For the bargain hunters, Cihampelas Street is a stone's throw away. You can find an array of items from cheap t-shirts to Scream-mask bagpack to the famed local dessert, durian ice-cream. For those who would be lost without their staple, the Ciwalk mall is just next to the hotel so you can have your daily feed of Starbucks or J Co. without feeling like you have left home. Those with small kids would probably like to leave the kids at the
reviews.title: Futuristic Hotel with best service

reviews.text: I was stayed there for escaping my weekend from busy weekday stuff in Bandung. This hotel gave me best experience, the staff is super friendly, full smile, and their welcome drink was uniquely tasty. The location is strategic for visitor who expect some nice crowd in Bandung, you will found a walking distance to street foods, or many fashion stores around Cihampelas Street. If you intend to feel a more cozy hangout, it is easy to found it as well since this hotel is built inside famous walking mall in Bandung, Ciwalk. Absolutely recommended!
reviews.title: Modern Hotel at the heart of Bandung city

reviews.text: The hotel has a concept of space efficient and modern design located at the crowd road in the middle of city, at the same compound of Ciwalk Mall.
reviews.title: mood breaker

description: Connected to the famous "Ciwalk" Bandung's unique boulevard-style shopping mall, Sensa Hotel is already an iconic symbol and landmark in the city skyline offering the best in ultimate comfort, convenience and carefree spaciousness.
